description: Fact-checked claims and statements from various sources

properties.name: claim
properties.description: The original claim or statement being fact-checked

properties.name: verdict
properties.description: The fact-check verdict (True, False, Mostly True, Mostly False, Half True, Pants on Fire, etc.)

properties.name: explanation
properties.description: Detailed explanation of the fact-check analysis

properties.name: source
properties.description: Source of the fact-check (PolitiFact, Snopes, etc.)

properties.name: url
properties.description: URL to the original fact-check article

properties.name: date
properties.description: Date when the fact-check was published

properties.name: category
properties.description: Category of the claim (politics, health, science, etc.)
